track.name: Basildon
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: Always produces close racing. A win in never guaranteed.

track.name: Baz Vegas
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: A natural extension of Basildon keeping the spirit of the original circuit.

track.name: Brentwood
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: A faithful re-creation of a real karting circuit situated in Essex. A hard track to master.

track.name: Crossfire
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: A cheeky little track. Not a serious racer, just a bit of fun.

track.name: Dagenham Dave
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: Inspired by the Ford Dagenham factory. One of the hardest circuits in the KARTS series.

track.name: Dock Of The Bay
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: Based on St. Katharine Docks, a tricky little circuit.

track.name: Flat
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: A high speed full-throttle racing experience. With no run offs, mistakes are costly.

track.name: Flat II
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: With one less corner than 'Flat', this is the ultimate high speed experience.

track.name: GTX-Clubman
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: Utilises the southern part of the GTX complex. Hard to make up time if behind.

track.name: GTX-Indy
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: The shortest of the three GTX circuits, a lot depends on the first and last corners.

track.name: GTX-National
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: The National is the longest of the GTX tracks. The back circuit features a hairpin.

track.name: In-Round
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: The Sprint season opener. A Classics oval, recently re-vamped.

track.name: Long Straight
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: A twisty track, despite the name. Always produces a good race.

track.name: Motocross
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: Features jumps and a crossover. Can be won and lost on the first corner.

track.name: PC World
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: A nostalgic tribute to the history of computing. Features everything from long straights to hairpins to tunnels.

track.name: RAC Rally
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: With a mix of terrains and tight town streets, 'RAC-Rally' is a challenging circuit.

track.name: Race Track
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: A new breed of circuit incorporating new racing track tiles. Several technical corners.

track.name: Rome
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: A unique circuit twisting through the tight Rome streets on a bed of gravel.

track.name: Rome City
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: An extended version of 'Rome' with patches of tarmac. Equally challenging.

track.name: Salt Lake City
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: Based on a real venue, this circuit provides great racing around the full length of the track.

track.name: Simples Mk III
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: The last surviving 'Simples' circuit. Looking out dated now and in need of a revamp.

track.name: Stadium
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: A new addition to the Sprint championship has proved to be an instant Classics. Very close racing.

track.name: Tarmac Terry
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: Once of the most technically demanding circuits. A very twisty end section requires great skill.

track.name: Test Track 020
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: Pick your way through the sand on 'TestTrack020s' end section.

track.name: The Suburbs
track.creator: Adrian
track.notes: Race through the Suburbs and into the forest on this accurately rendered track. Look out for road closures!

track.name: The Zone
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: A Classics track that always produces close racing. Harder than it looks.

track.name: Woody Green
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: An extended version of 'Woody Parl' which allows you to open up the throttle a bit more.. But be carefull!

track.name: Woody Park
track.creator: Mark
track.notes: A simple looking track that deserves full respect. Requires high skill and a light touch.
